com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board

Class TerritoryBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board.TerritoryBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filterable, Selectable

    public class TerritoryBorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Selectable
    A Territory Border is a model fabrication that encapsulates internal Territory data when it is not needed. A TerritoryBorders responsibilities revolve around how many other Territories (which actually means TerritoryBorders, it is connected to.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TerritoryBorder

        public TerritoryBorder(int edgeCount)
        Creates a TerritoryBorder with an internal Territory that is owned by NullPlayer and has no dice on it. This constructor does not connect this object to any other TerritoryBorders.
        Parameters:
        edgeCount - How many TerritoryBorders can a Player get to from this TerritoryBorder.
